lines.text: Campfire in Beekers Rocks. Want me to scout it, Mr. Blake?
If it's an ambush they wouldn't light a fire.
[Sgt. Blake orders the cache of repeating rifles burned to keep them from being captured by Apaches]
We lugged those rifles for a hundred miles... a hundred miles for nothing!
No, not for nothing. Sometimes you gotta lose before you finally win.
